text: The Military Rabbinate (of Israel), Hebrew: חיל הרבנות הצבאית - Heil HaRabanut HaTzvait, is a unit of the Israel Defense Forces, which takes care of the religious needs of the Israeli soldiers, especially the Jewish soldiers among them. The Chief Military Rabbi presides the Military Rabbinate, and has the rank of brigadier general. == Related pages == * List of Chief Military Rabbis == References == * Military Rabbinate Category:Israel Defense Forces Category:Judaism in Israel Category:Organizations based in Israel
title: Military Rabbinate
